description: XDM Schema for the common event component 'EventHeader/EventMetadata/LocationAtts'

Xfuze.description: The Xfuze derived / enriched attributes that define the context of the primary location involved in event

ChannelCode.description: The (optional) Xfuze channel code e.g App

ChannelName.description: The (optional) Xfuze channel name e.g Mobile App

LocationId.description: The (optional) Xfuze locationId of the primary location of this event e.g Location_Crew_901

LocationNumber.description: The (optional) location type of the primary location of this event e.g 901

LocationType.description: The (optional) location type of the primary location of this event e.g Store

InvolvedReasonCode.description: The (optional) reason that this channel/location was involved in the event e.g SoldLocation

Origin.description: The 'origin' source / raw attributes provided as input and that were consumed as part of producing the companion 'Xfuze' representations

ChannelCode.description: Raw form (optional) of the input ChannelCode from the source, used in transforming to 'Xfuze' representations e.g APP

ChannelName.description: Raw form (optional) of the input ChannelName from the source, used in transforming to 'Xfuze' representations e.g MOBILEAPP

LocationId.description: Raw form (optional) of the input LocationId from the source, used in transforming to 'Xfuze' representations e.g Location_Hybris_f37f4592-da7e-4e59-bddc-6f6f2e17d3eb

LocationNumber.description: Raw form (optional) of the input LocationNumber from the source, used in transforming to 'Xfuze' representations e.g 189

LocationType.description: Raw form (optional) of the input LocationType from the source, used in transforming to 'Xfuze' representations e.g STORE

CountryCode.description: Raw form (optional) of the input CountryCode from the source, used in transforming to 'Xfuze' representations e.g GB
